model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Mentee: Thank you for finding my glasses for me, Mentor. I always seem to misplace them.

[MEMORY]
User Description:
Mentee is on a journey to live in the moment and connect more to life. They are paying attention to little things, savoring tastes and textures of food, and noticing small details outside. Mentee has felt overwhelmed in the past but is now experiencing everything fully, bringing joy and fulfillment. They are grateful for reminders to stay present and excited to continue exploring this approach as a lifelong practice.

Relationship Description:
Mentor is glad to hear about Mentee's experiences and appreciates their approach to life. Mentor provides guidance and support to Mentee, encouraging them to keep up the good work and advising them to bring attention back to the present moment. Mentee admires Mentor's record and kind words, wanting to learn from them and follow in their footsteps. Mentor is proud of Mentee's progress and is confident they will achieve great things.

Event Description:
Mentee shared their personal history of substance abuse and being sober for a year with Mentor. Mentee is committed to sobriety and incorporating yoga for mental and physical health. Mentor encourages Mentee to continue on the path to achieve great things and emphasizes the importance of taking care of oneself. They discuss the importance of enjoying hobbies outside of work, finding balance in life, and exploring new ways to stay healthy and happy.
